title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin has a change of heart and explains why Joe Burrow should be the NFL MVP over Aaron Rodgers and it has nothing to do with his vaccination status. He shares a cautionary tale about teams giving in to the super stars and how it can go wrong quickly. He discusses a report about Baker Mayfield's future with the Browns and why his relationship with his head coach has deteriorated. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to argue for Rodgers being the most talented passer in the history of the league.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
